summary: Implements a dataset class that automatically downloads, extracts, caches, and converts nine standard graph classification benchmark collections into DGL graph objects, optionally adding self‑loops and degree‑based node labels or one‑hot node features, and exposes them as an indexed sequence of (graph, label) pairs with class count information.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to easily obtain and use popular graph classification benchmarks for training and evaluating graph neural network models, ensuring reproducible and streamlined experimentation.
